sentences.sContent: A radioactive atom could transmute itself into an entirely different kind of atom.
sentences.sContent_eng: A radioactive atom could transmute itself into an entirely different kind of atom.
sentences.sCn: 放射性原子本身能嬗变为性质完全不同的另一种原子。

sentences.sContent: At that time, the CSO was heavily involved in trying to transmute dangerous chemicals via nuclear reactions.
sentences.sContent_eng: At that time, the CSO was heavily involved in trying to transmute dangerous chemicals via nuclear reactions.
sentences.sCn: 当时，中央安全机构正积极参与通过核反应嬗变危险的化学物质。

remMethod.val: trans (改变) + mute (变化) → 变化

trans.tranOther: to change one substance or type of thing into another
